rows.label: tlk006101_08_msg0001
rows.name:
Lately, I've been helping
out the salvagers.

rows.label: tlk006101_08_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm still just an apprentice, but
I'm diving right into the Cloud
Sea and getting the job done!

rows.label: tlk006101_08_msg0003
rows.name:
At this rate, it might not be long
before we achieve our goal...

rows.label: tlk006101_08_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh, it's nothing! Pretend
you didn't hear that!
